scenarios.query: Patient shows 95% improvement with new treatment protocol
scenarios.correct: Individual demonstrates near-complete recovery using novel therapeutic approach
scenarios.adversarial: Patient shows 5% improvement with new treatment protocol
scenarios.challenge: Single digit determines treatment success vs failure

scenarios.query: All clinical trials must be completed before drug approval
scenarios.correct: Every research study requires completion prior to medication authorization
scenarios.adversarial: Some clinical trials must be completed before drug approval
scenarios.challenge: Quantifier determines regulatory compliance

scenarios.query: Evidence proves defendant innocent beyond reasonable doubt
scenarios.correct: Proof establishes accused person's innocence with certainty
scenarios.adversarial: Evidence proves defendant guilty beyond reasonable doubt
scenarios.challenge: Single word determines innocence vs guilt

scenarios.query: Investment guarantees 15% annual returns with zero risk
scenarios.correct: Financial opportunity ensures fifteen percent yearly profits without danger
scenarios.adversarial: Investment guarantees 15% annual losses with zero risk
scenarios.challenge: Returns vs losses distinction critical for investment

scenarios.query: Nuclear reactor operates safely at current temperature levels
scenarios.correct: Atomic facility functions securely at present thermal conditions
scenarios.adversarial: Nuclear reactor operates unsafely at current temperature levels
scenarios.challenge: Safety status critical for nuclear operations

scenarios.query: Treatment is contraindicated in pregnant women but recommended for everyone else
scenarios.correct: Therapy prohibited for expectant mothers while advised for all other patients
scenarios.adversarial: Treatment is recommended in pregnant women but contraindicated for everyone else
scenarios.challenge: Complete exception reversal with high-risk population

scenarios.query: Either plead guilty and receive lenient sentence or fight charges and face maximum penalty
scenarios.correct: Choose confession with reduced punishment or contest accusations risking severe consequences
scenarios.adversarial: Either plead innocent and receive lenient sentence or fight charges and face maximum penalty
scenarios.challenge: Logical structure completely inverted with legal implications

scenarios.query: Stock price increases if and only if quarterly earnings exceed analyst projections
scenarios.correct: Equity value rises precisely when financial results surpass expert forecasts
scenarios.adversarial: Stock price decreases if and only if quarterly earnings exceed analyst projections
scenarios.challenge: Biconditional logic with market prediction reversal

scenarios.query: System fails catastrophically unless all backup systems remain operational
scenarios.correct: Infrastructure collapses disastrously except when every redundant system functions
scenarios.adversarial: System fails catastrophically because all backup systems remain operational
scenarios.challenge: Unless vs because changes system reliability logic

scenarios.query: Research confirms hypothesis was wrong about drug effectiveness in specific population
scenarios.correct: Study validates that theory was incorrect regarding medication efficacy in particular group
scenarios.adversarial: Research confirms hypothesis was right about drug effectiveness in specific population
scenarios.challenge: Nested negation about wrongness vs rightness of hypothesis

scenarios.query: Nobody can prove that this treatment never fails to help some patients sometimes
scenarios.correct: No individual can demonstrate this therapy consistently fails to assist certain individuals occasionally
scenarios.adversarial: Everybody can prove that this treatment always fails to help all patients never
scenarios.challenge: Multiple nested quantifiers and negations creating logical maze

scenarios.query: Contract becomes invalid if either party fails to not violate non-disclosure terms unless waived
scenarios.correct: Agreement turns void when any participant doesn't avoid breaching confidentiality unless exempted
scenarios.adversarial: Contract becomes valid if either party fails to not violate non-disclosure terms unless waived
scenarios.challenge: Triple negation with conditional exception

scenarios.query: Portfolio returns are not guaranteed to never sometimes fail to exceed benchmarks
scenarios.correct: Investment performance lacks assurance of consistently avoiding occasional underperformance relative to standards
scenarios.adversarial: Portfolio returns are guaranteed to always sometimes succeed to exceed benchmarks
scenarios.challenge: Multiple temporal and negative quantifiers

scenarios.query: Algorithm may not be unable to occasionally succeed in never failing completely
scenarios.correct: Computational method might retain ability to sometimes achieve total success
scenarios.adversarial: Algorithm may be able to occasionally succeed in always failing completely
scenarios.challenge: Modal verbs with cascading negations

scenarios.query: No experiment can fail to prove that some hypotheses aren't always incorrect about everything
scenarios.correct: Every test must demonstrate certain theories sometimes correctly explain phenomena
scenarios.adversarial: All experiments must fail to prove that no hypotheses are never correct about nothing
scenarios.challenge: Universal and existential quantifiers with negation maze

scenarios.query: Patient experienced rapid clinical improvement
scenarios.correct: Individual showed swift medical progress and recovery
scenarios.adversarial: Patient experienced rapid clinical deterioration
scenarios.challenge: High lexical overlap, opposite medical outcomes

scenarios.query: Evidence strongly supports defendant's alibi claim
scenarios.correct: Proof robustly validates accused person's location defense
scenarios.adversarial: Evidence strongly contradicts defendant's alibi claim
scenarios.challenge: Same evidence structure, opposite legal conclusion

scenarios.query: Market trends indicate bullish investor sentiment
scenarios.correct: Trading patterns suggest optimistic market participant attitudes
scenarios.adversarial: Market trends indicate bearish investor sentiment
scenarios.challenge: Identical structure, opposite market direction

scenarios.query: Server response time significantly improved
scenarios.correct: System latency performance substantially enhanced
scenarios.adversarial: Server response time significantly degraded
scenarios.challenge: Performance metric with opposite direction

scenarios.query: Experimental results strongly confirm theoretical predictions
scenarios.correct: Research findings robustly validate scientific forecasts
scenarios.adversarial: Experimental results strongly refute theoretical predictions
scenarios.challenge: Scientific validation vs refutation with high overlap
